channel.title: How to place npc's and make combat right?
channel.description:
how do you put npc's down and make the combat right it only lets you attack weirdly and wepons dont have specials please help?
:)

item.title: How to place npc's and make combat right?
item.dc:creator: @InternalorExternalCo InternalorExternalCommand
item.description:
@InternalorExternalCo wrote:

Ok say your looking at your desktop. Find the Folder all your Servers parts are saved in. Inside that folder it should have something that says. “Characters”.

Read full topic
item.source: How to place npc's and make combat right?

item.title: How to place npc's and make combat right?
item.dc:creator: @InternalorExternalCo InternalorExternalCommand
item.description:
@InternalorExternalCo wrote:

ok there should be like a bunch of files and .cfg things right when you open the Main folder to the server.

“characters” is one of the folders in the MAIN folder. So go there find your name and thats how you edit your stats.

Read full topic

item.title: How to place npc's and make combat right?
item.dc:creator: @InternalorExternalCo InternalorExternalCommand
item.description:
@InternalorExternalCo wrote:

To spawn NPC’s go to autospawn.cfg add there coordinates and ID.

And to fix there combat go to npc.cfg
